member.name: T:RpaLib.Database.QueryReturn
member.summary: Class that represents the return type of any Query

member.name: M:RpaLib.SAP.Grid.Parse
member.summary: Generate the DataTable property by parsing the GuiGridView object.

member.name: M:RpaLib.ProcessAutomation.Rpa.WaitUntilFileAppear(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits until a file (full path string) appears within its base directory. It will wait until file appear or timeout exceed. The refresh rate sleep is also configurable (defaults to 0.5 seconds).
member.param: The full path to the file it's needed to wait until appear
The timeout in seconds you need to wait
The time in milliseconds between each refresh in files parent dir

member.name: M:RpaLib.ProcessAutomation.Rpa.WaitUntilFileAppear(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)
member.summary: Waits until a file that matches the Regex appear in the full path to its parent dir given
member.param: Regex to match the file name
Timeout representing the maximuma time to wait for file until FileNotFoundException be thrown
The time in milliseconds between each refresh in file's parent directory
Regular Expression matching options to be considered when matching, such as Ignoring Case

member.name: M:DocuSign.CodeExamples.Authentication.JWTAuth.AuthenticateWithJWT(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Uses Json Web Token (JWT) Authentication Method to obtain the necessary information needed to make API calls.
member.returns: Auth token needed for API calls
